Package helperTime

Class TimeTranslation

java.lang.Object
helperTime.TimeTranslation
public class TimeTranslation extends Object
The time translation class handles all function that help with time translation.

      public static LocalDateTime systemToUTC(LocalDateTime currentTime)
      The systemToUTC function translates time from the local system time to UTC time.

      currentTime - the local current time
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • returnBusinessHours

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<LocalTime> returnBusinessHours()
      The returnBusinessHours function returns an observable list of the office hours converted to local system time. The observable list has the hours separated by 15 minutes.
      Returns:
      observable list of local times
